Congratulations %{inviter_first_name}! You just earned %{count} free month of Strava because %{invitee_name} signed up from your invitation. The credit has already been applied to your account. Enjoy!

¡Enhorabuena, %{inviter_first_name}! Acabas de ganar %{count} mes gratis en Strava porque %{invitee_name} se ha suscrito gracias a tu invitación. El crédito ya se ha cargado en tu cuenta. ¡A disfrutar!

By subscribing to Strava, you agree to be charged %{promoPrice} for %{promoDuration} month, then %{price}/mo afterwards. You can cancel your membership at any time.
